Name: You are alone
About the game: It is a story about a wife who wants to take back her scientist husband who was kidnapped by the mafia after trying to destroy his invention after the mafia learned about this invention And also her attempt to fulfill her husband's will and destroy this invention It is a game full of surprises and combat I added a 6X scoop The red point scoop and holograph scoop, in addition to the thermal scoop, the silencer for the weapon, a quick store for ammunition, a light bell and a laser to add more fun to playing I placed a directional arrow at the top of the screen showing the missions and how far away they are There is a wide variety of enemies and missions that you must discover by yourself And I set the grenade return feature where all you have to equip after you hold down the right mouse button and if you stop pressing it back in place As for if you want to throw it, all you have to do is continue to press the right mouse button and then press the left mouse button to throw And placed inside the game the buttons required to play Where 1, 2, 3, and 4 are to equip the different types of weapon And the Q button to show the attachment list And the button w to capture And the P button to pause And Ctrl to crouch I added a 6X scoop The red point scoop and holo scoop, in addition to the thermal scoop, the silencer for the weapon, a quick store for ammunition, a light bell and a laser to add more fun to playing I placed a directional arrow at the top of the screen showing the missions and how far away they are There is a wide variety of enemies and missions that you must discover by yourself And I set the grenade return feature where all you have to equip after you hold down the right mouse button and if you stop pressing it back in place As for if you want to throw it, all you have to do is continue to press the right mouse button and then press the left mouse button to throw And placed inside the game the buttons required to play Where 1, 2, 3, and 4 are to equip the different types of weapon the Q button to show the attachmint list the button w to capture the P button to pause Ctrl to crouch Right mouse button to aim And the left button To shoot Shift button to run and button R to reload the gun
